xCAT2 Release Information¶

The following table is a summary of the new operating system (OS), hardware, and features that are added to each xCAT release. The OS and hardware listed in the table have been fully tested with xCAT. For a more detailed list of new function, bug fixes, restrictions and known problems, refer to the individual release notes for a specific release.

  • RHEL - Red Hat Enterprise Linux
  • SLES - Suse Linux Enterprise Server
  • UBT - Ubuntu

xCAT 2.13.x¶

xCAT Version New OS New Hardware New Feature
xCAT 2.13.1
2017/1/13
2.13.1 Release Notes
    
  • ONIE switch support
  • refine xcatprobe subcommand: xcatmn, osdeploy
  • add utp-wait for genesis-base
xCAT 2.13
2016/12/09
2.13 Release Notes
  • SLES 12.2
  
  • update drivers for genesis-base mlx4-en 3.2-1.0.1.1 i40e 1.5.16
  • rflash saving flashing progress
  • Update configureRAID document
  • statelite image create by copyds

xCAT 2.12.x¶

xCAT Version New OS New Hardware New Feature
xCAT 2.12.4
2016/11/11
2.12.4 Release Notes
  • RHEL 7.3 LE
  • RHEV 4.0
  
  • noboot added to dhcpinterface
  • new xcatprobe subcommand: xcatmn, deploy and discover
xCAT 2.12.3
2016/09/30
2.12.3 Release Notes
    
  • GitHub Issues resolved
  • rinv options for OpenPower
  • switch based switch discovery
  • additional options added to xcatprobe command
  • mkdef takes file redirection
xCAT 2.12.2
2016/08/19
2.12.2 Release Notes
  • UBT 16.04.1
  
  • nodeset <noderange> offline
  • Enhance: node status update
  • Support Bond for install nics
  • xcatprobe osdeploy -r (BETA)
  • New opt: packimage -m -c
xCAT 2.12.1
2016/07/08
2.12.1 Release Notes
    
  • New xCAT install tool: go-xcat
  • New opt: mkdef/lsdef –template
  • Support rinstall for all OS/ARCH
  • site.xcatdebugmode for diskless
  • Refine discovery framework
  • rscan <kvmhost>
  • New: xcatprobe (experimental)
xCAT 2.12
2016/5/20
2.12 Release Notes
  • RHEL 6.8
  • UBT 14.4.4 LE
  • UBT 16.04
  
  • Docker: xCAT in Docker
  • Docker: container life cycle mgt
  • Docker: Set up Docker Registry
  • New command: getadapter
  • Add get_install_disk (diskful)
  • Add site.xcatdebugmode
  • Add switchdiscover -s snmp
  • Disable auditlog by default
  • Add site.hierarchicalattrs

xCAT 2.11.x¶

xCAT Version New OS New Hardware New Feature
xCAT 2.11.1
2016/04/22
2.11.1 Release Notes
    
  • Bug fix
xCAT 2.11
2015/12/11
2.11 Release Notes
  • RHEL 7.2 LE
  • UBT 14.4.3 LE
  • UBT 15.10 LE
  • PowerKVM 3.1
  • S822LC(GCA)
  • S822LC(GTA)
  • S812LC
  • NeuCloud OP
  • ZoomNet RP
  • NVIDIA GPU for OpenPOWER
  • Infiniband for OpenPOWER
  • SW KIT support for OpenPOWER
  • renergy command for OpenPOWER
  • rflash command for OpenPower
  • Add xCAT Troubleshooting Log
  • xCAT Log Classification
  • RAID Configuration
  • Accelerate genimage process
  • Add bmcdiscover Command
  • Enhance xcatdebugmode
  • new xCAT doc in ReadTheDocs

xCAT 2.10.x¶

xCAT Version New OS New Hardware New Feature
xCAT 2.10
2015/07/31
2.10 Release Notes
  • RHEL 7.1 LE
  • UBT 15.4 LE
  • SLES 12 LE
  • RHEL 6.7
  • CentOS 7.1
  • SLES 11 SP4
  • Power 8 LE
  • Ubuntu LE -> RH 7.1 Mix
  • Cuda install for Ubuntu 14.4.2
  • additional kernel parameters
  • customized disk part (Ubuntu)
  • RAID configure base iprconfig
  • New command: switchdiscover
  • New command: makentp
  • New command: bmcdiscovery
  • Support getmacs –noping
  • site.xcatdebugmode
  • validate netboot attribute
  • buildcore on local server
  • copycds generates fewer osimage
  • nodeset only accepts osimage=

xCAT 2.9.x¶

xCAT Version New OS New Hardware New Feature
xCAT 2.9.3 for AIX
2016/03/11
2.9.3 Release Notes
  • AIX 7.2.0
  • AIX 7.1.4.1
  
  • new format in synclist (node)
xCAT 2.9.2 for AIX
2015/11/11
2.9.2 Release Notes
  • AIX 6.1.8.6
  • AIX 6.1.9.5
  • AIX 7.1.3.5
  • Power 8 for AIX
  • ssl version control in xcatd
xCAT 2.9.1 [1]
2015/03/20
2.9.1 Release Notes
  • RHEL 7.1
  • UBT 14.04.2
  • SLES 11 SP3 and later ONLY
  
  • Nvidia GPU
  • Ubuntu Local Mirror
  • SLES12 diskless
  • Energy management for Power 8
  • RHEL 7.1 LE -> BE mix cluster
  • nics.nicextraparams
  • xCAT in Docker Image
  • confluent replaces conserver
  • TLSv1 in xcatd
  • New GPG key for xCAT packages
  • fast restart xcatd (systemd)
  • netboot method: grub2-tftp
  • netboot method: grub2-http
xCAT 2.9
2014/12/12
2.9 Release Notes
  • UBT 14.4 LE
  • UBT 14.4.1 LE
  • UBT 14.10
  • SLES 12
  • RHEL 6.6
  • AIX 7.1.3.15
  • PowerKVM
  • Power 8 LE
  • sysclone enhancements
  • site.auditnosyslog
  • site.nmapoptions
  • customize postscripts
  • Power 8 LE hw discover
  • IB support for P8 LE
[1]xCAT 2.9.1 onwards provides support for Kernel-based Virtual Machines (KVM) and requires an operating system that ships the perl-Sys-Virt package.
